job_title: Senior SAP Project Manager – Tech and Security Workstreams

job_details.degree_required: Bachelor’s Degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or related field.

jd: From: Sri, Shrive Technologies sri@shrivetechnologies.com Reply to: sri@shrivetechnologies.com Title: Senior SAP Project Manager – Tech and Security WorkstreamsLocation: Nebraska, USAExperience: 10+ yearsKey Responsibilities:· Project Management: Lead end-to-end project delivery for SAP-related technology and security workstreams. Oversee project planning, resource allocation, and execution to ensure timely and successful project completion.· Stakeholder Engagement: Act as the primary point of contact for clients, ensuring clear communication between business and IT teams, and addressing any concerns or escalations promptly.· Technology and Security Oversight: Drive the design, implementation, and optimization of SAP technical landscapes, including infrastructure, data security, user access management, and compliance with industry standards.· Team Leadership: Coordinate cross-functional teams, including SAP functional/technical consultants, cybersecurity professionals, and infrastructure teams, to achieve project goals.· Risk Management: Identify potential risks and issues related to project timelines, security, and technology, and implement mitigation strategies to minimize impact.· Budget and Resource Management: Manage project budgets, resource forecasts, and vendor relationships, ensuring projects are delivered within scope and on budget.· Reporting and Documentation: Create and maintain detailed project documentation, including project plans, status reports, and security compliance documents.Required Qualifications:· Bachelor’s Degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or related field.· 10+ years of SAP project management experience, with a focus on technology and security workstreams.· Proven experience managing SAP projects in construction or railroad industries is highly preferred.· Deep understanding of SAP technical infrastructure, including HANA, BASIS, and SAP security solutions (e.g., GRC, IDM).· Solid knowledge of cybersecurity principles and experience implementing SAP security controls.· Experience with SAP cloud migration or S/4HANA upgrades is a plus.· Strong leadership, communication, and interpersonal skills with the ability to manage complex, cross-functional projects.· PMP or SAP certification is preferred.
